languages.text: "Этот осторожный и рассудительный брат-эконом кажется более безопасным, чем фанатичка и аристократ-заумник. Голоса подсказывают, что у него есть маленькие секреты, знание которых гарантирует нам его лояльность".

"A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."
languages.original_text: "Этот осторожный и рассудительный брат-эконом кажется более безопасным, чем фанатичка и аристократ-заумник. Голоса подсказывают, что у него есть маленькие секреты, знание которых гарантирует нам его лояльность".

traits.locale_text: "A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has little secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

"A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has little secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

"A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

"A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

"A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

"A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

languages.text: «Un oikonomos más cuidadoso y sensato me parece una mejor opción que un fanático o un aristócrata astuto. Según las voces, tiene pocos secretos y conocerlos nos garantiza su lealtad».
languages.original_text: "A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

traits.locale_text: «Un oikonomos más cuidadoso y sensato me parece una mejor opción que un fanático o un aristócrata astuto. Según las voces, tiene pocos secretos y conocerlos nos garantiza su lealtad».

languages.text: « Je préfère de loin un oïkonomos discret et raisonnable à une fanatique ou un aristocrate habile. Les voix m'ont révélé certains de ses petits secrets inavouables, ce qui devrait nous permettre de nous assurer sa loyauté. »
languages.original_text: "A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère de loin un oïkonomos discret et raisonnable à une fanatique ou un aristocrate habile. Les voix m’ont révélé certains de ses petits secrets inavouables, ce qui devrait nous permettre de nous assurer sa loyauté. »

languages.text: “在我看来，比起宗教狂热分子或狡猾的贵族，成熟稳重的总管是更保险的选择。那些声音告诉我，说他有些无伤大雅的小秘密。只要掌握了这些秘密，他就只能任由我们拿捏了。”
languages.original_text: "A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，比起宗教狂热分子或狡猾的贵族，成熟稳重的总管是更保险的选择。那些声音告诉我，说他有些无伤大雅的小秘密。只要掌握了这些秘密，他就只能任由我们拿捏了。”

languages.text: 「慎重で分別のあるオイコノモスは、狂信者や利口な貴族階級よりも安全な賭けに思えるわ。声によれば、彼はささやかな秘密を持っていて、その秘密を知ることで彼の忠誠を確かなものとできるそうよ」
languages.original_text: "A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

traits.locale_text: 「慎重で分別のあるオイコノモスは、狂信者や利口な貴族階級よりも安全な賭けに思えるわ。声によれば、彼はささやかな秘密を持っていて、その秘密を知ることで彼の忠誠を確かなものとできるそうよ」

languages.text: "Ein vorsichtiger und vernünftiger Oikonomos erscheint mir vielversprechender als ein Fanatiker oder ein gerissener Aristokrat. Die Stimmen sagen, dass er einige erbärmliche Geheimnisse hat, und das Wissen um diese Geheimnisse garantiert uns seine Loyalität."
languages.original_text: "A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."

traits.locale_text: "Ein vorsichtiger und vernünftiger Oikonomos erscheint mir vielversprechender als ein Fanatiker oder ein gerissener Aristokrat. Die Stimmen sagen, dass er einige erbärmliche Geheimnisse hat, und das Wissen um diese Geheimnisse garantiert uns seine Loyalität."

languages.text: "Dikkatli ve aklı başında bir kâhya, bana bir fanatik ya da kurnaz bir aristokrattan daha güvenli bir seçim gibi geliyor. Duyduklarıma göre önemsiz birkaç sırrı varmış. Bu sırların varlığından haberdar olmamız da sadakatini garantiliyor."
languages.original_text: "A careful and sensible oikonomos sounds like a safer bet to me than a fanatic or a clever aristocrat. The voices say that he has a few paltry secrets, and knowledge of those secrets guarantees us his loyalty."
